name: VAPI Tech
description: Log every details and concern of the caller

final_outcome.description:
outcome of the call / chat

resolved: Issue of the customer is resolved
escalated_ticket: issue was not resolved within the conversation and ticket needs to be escalated to a different support
faq_answered: customer only asked for some information, no troubleshooting included
ended: conversation was not finished when it ended

issue_summary.description: summary of the issue encountered by customer.

ticket_reason.description:
reason for ticket creation:

unresolved: issue was not resolved and needed escalation for higher support
out_of_scope: issue was not covered by level 1 support
user_requested: explicitly requested by customer

primary_intent.description:
intent of the customer.

faq: asked some information about the business, no troubleshooting included
troubleshooting: need some issue to be resolved
ticket: customer wanted to raise a ticket

troubleshooting_attempted.description: if troubleshooting was attempted for the customer concern

troubleshooting_steps_count.description: how many steps did the troubleshooting take.
